markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Gnaw](/Actions.aspx?ID=347) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 80</row>

**Requirements** The animal companion’s last action was a successful jaws Strike.

</column>

---

The Strike’s target takes 1d6 [persistent](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) bleed damage and takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it removes the bleed damage. If the hyena is a specialized animal companion, the persistent bleed damage increases to 2d6.
name: Gnaw
requirement: The animal companion’s last action was a successful jaws Strike.
